title: Sidewrks
tagline: A quiet workspace for shipping side projects and learning from real outcomes.

honestFraming.whatItIs: A personal site documenting what gets built, paused, or killed. A place to be honest about side projects—what worked, what didn't, and why.
honestFraming.whatItIsNot: Not a portfolio of polished successes. Not trying to impress—just trying to learn and share openly.

whoItsFor: Other builders curious about honest project journeys
People tired of seeing only success stories
Anyone interested in the messy middle of side projects
whoItsNotFor: Those looking for a startup template or playbook
People who want quick tips without context

currentState: The site is live and actively updated with blog posts, project updates, and experiments in building.

experiments.title: Writing in public
experiments.description: Publishing thoughts and learnings about side projects as they happen
experiments.signalLookingFor: Does writing help clarify thinking? Does it resonate with others?

seoDescription: Sidewrks is a quiet workspace for shipping side projects and learning from real outcomes. Honest documentation of what gets built, paused, or killed.
